entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
